Lyric:
[by:小陀螺Tony]
[ti:Still Alive (Mike Wit Remix) 33544273]
[ar:Mike Wit Lisa Miskovsky]
[al:]
[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]
[00:09.34]I have changed
[00:11.22]I have changed
[00:13.19]Just like you
[00:15.52]Just like you
[00:17.44]
[00:18.20]For how long?
[00:20.03]For how long
[00:22.15]Must I wait?
[00:23.41]I know there's something wrong
[00:26.60]
[00:26.86]Your concrete heart isn't beating
[00:30.60]And I've tried to
[00:32.67]Make it come alive
[00:34.95]
[00:35.56]No shadows
[00:37.68]Just red lights
[00:39.76]Now I'm here to rescue you, ooh
[00:45.04]
[00:52.33]Oh I'm still alive
[00:54.82]I'm still alive
[00:57.04]I cannot apologize, ooh
[01:04.53]
[01:10.10]Oh I'm still alive
[01:12.23]I'm still alive
[01:14.35]I cannot apologize, ooh
[01:19.15]
[01:54.06]So silent
[01:56.23]No violence
[01:57.95]But inside my head
[02:00.62]So loud and clear
[02:02.10]
[02:02.95]You're screaming
[02:04.98]You're screaming
[02:06.95]Covered up with a smile I've learned to fear
[02:10.90]
[02:11.51]Just sunshine
[02:13.73]And blue sky
[02:15.46]Is this all we get for living here?
[02:19.90]
[02:20.41]Come fire
[02:22.22]Come fire
[02:24.41]Let it burn and love come racing through
[02:29.01]
[02:37.18]Oh I'm still alive
[02:39.86]I'm still alive
[02:42.23]I cannot apologize, ooh
[02:47.49]
[02:54.63]Oh I'm still alive
[02:57.42]I'm still alive
[02:59.70]I cannot apologize, ooh
[03:05.61]
